damaged.translation[0].definitions[0].de: something that is damaged has been harmed or injured
damaged.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: a shampoo for dry or damaged hair (=hair that is in bad condition)
damaged.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a damaged person has emotional problems because of bad things that have happened to them in the past
damaged.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: She works with emotionally damaged children.
